name: Niko Taxonomy Filters
author: @trevald

sections.description: I was looking for a plugin that would add the possibility to filter the post list in admin based on available taxonomies for the current post type. Could only find snippets that neede to be modified per post type and taxonomy. This plugin works with native post types aswell as custom. It checks which taxonomies are registered for each post type and display only relevant taxonomies as filters.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this work woth custom post types?

Yes.

Does this work with custom taxonomies?

Yes.

short_description: Adds taxonomy filters to post listing pages in admin. Creates dropdown only for taxonomies connected to current post type.
